grievance_text: Garbage has not been collected from my street for a week.
There is a huge pile of waste near the park entrance.
Dustbins are overflowing in Sector 14 market.
The street cleaning truck hasn't come for 3 days.
Rotting garbage smell is unbearable in our locality.
Potholes on the main road are causing severe traffic jams.
The road surface is uneven and dangerous for bikers.
Construction debris left on the road is blocking traffic.
Need immediate repair of the road near the school.
Street lights are not working in our colony.
Frequent power cuts are affecting our work.
The electric pole is leaning dangerously.
Streetlight on corner of 5th street is broken.
No water supply in our area since yesterday morning.
The water coming from the tap is muddy and smelly.
Water pipeline burst on the main road.
Low water pressure in the mornings.
There was a chain snatching incident near the bus stop.
Suspicious activities observed in the abandoned building.
Need more police patrolling at night in this area.
My parked bike was stolen from the market area.
Bus 505 is always late and overcrowded.
The metro station escalator is not working.
Auto drivers are refusing to go by meter.
Need better bus connectivity to the industrial area.
Drainage is blocked and water is entering houses.
Open manhole is a death trap for pedestrians.
Voltage fluctuation damaged my appliances.
Sewer water is mixing with drinking water supply.
Loud noise from neighbors late at night.
No electricity in the house.
My wallet was stolen.
Thieves broke into the shop.
